data.text: @labrardfelix Hi Felix, we regret to learn that you're affected by flight cancellation. Please use the following online form: https://t.co/Wi487kEXBT to submit your complaint. Best regards, Christiane

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @angelesurzuae Hi there, we're sincerely sorry that you're affected by a cancellation. Please send us your booking code and preferred option in a DM so we can have a closer look at it. Best regards, Christiane https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

@rosikazantseva Hi Rositsa, we regret to learn that also you are affected by a flight cancellation. Please send us your booking code in a DM so we can have a look for any option more convenient for you. Best regards, Christiane https://t.co/3NgZx6AFJS

@burstonthomas [1/2] Hi there, 
We’re sorry to hear that your luggage wasn't duly delivered. We want you to know that we can completely understand your anger but we can’t offer an immediate solution in this case.

@burstonthomas [2/2] Unfortunately the Social Media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you. Please continue to refer to the responsible colleagues from the PIR Report for any potential queries.
@princezapravde Hi Sweety, the flight got canceled due to operational reasons. Best regards, Christiane
@placebo0815 Hallo Oscar, bitte schick uns doch deinen Buchungscode in einer DM. Gerne sehen wir uns das näher an. Liebe Grüße, Christiane https://t.co/3NgZx6AFJS
@mi57598529 Hi Michael, please send us your booking code in a DM so we can have a closer look at it. Best regards, Christiane

@realseppwatt Hallo Sepp, es tut uns sehr leid, dass auch du von einer Flugannullierung betroffen bist. Bitte schick uns doch deinen Buchungscode in einer DM, damit wir uns das genauer ansehen können. Liebe Grüße, Christiane https://t.co/3NgZx6AFJS

@KATIE_kirky @airfrance Hi Katie, I apologize for the inconvenience and we’re sorry to hear that your luggage wasn't duly delivered. You can track your baggage online via the following link: https://t.co/5a1xgUCD33 - or turn to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report. Best regards, Brigitte

urls.title: Enquiry about ticket refunds at customer request
urls.description: You can request refunds for a flight booked on the Austrian Airlines website via our contact form. We’re here to help.

data.text: @ClaireDoerr15 Hi Claire, we're sincerely sorry that you're affected by a flight cancellation. Please send us your booking code in a DM so we can have a closer look at it. Best regards, Christiane https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

@andersdruv Hi Anders, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding.  Kind regards, Chris

@SaschaNitra Hi Sascha, we are sorry to hear that you have been affected by a cancellation and we apologize for any inconvenience caused. Is there anything we can still assist you with? Kind regards, Chris
@yshalf Hi Jordi, we are sorry to hear you have been affected by a cancellation and we apologize for any inconvenience caused. Is there anything we can still assist you with? Kind regards, Chris

@kris48736778 Hi there, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Chris
@sty0pa Hi there, we regret reading about this unfortunate situation. Please feel free to seek reimbursement by submitting a claim here: https://t.co/CYbLamOUFH  Kind regards, Chris

data.text: @ProfOnderco Hi Michal, please send us your booking code in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris

@c_kronenberg Hi Christopher, es tut uns leid, falls du von einer Storierung betroffen warst und wir entschuldigen uns für die Unannehmlichkeiten. Können wir dir noch weiterhelfen? Freundliche Grüße, Chris

@mbech25 Hi there, I'm really sorry that you're having trouble contacting us. Our colleagues are confronted with a high amount of requests at the moment and you may experience longer waiting times. For booking a separate ticket only for a child you need to contact  [1/2]
@mbech25 our call center directly as only they can accept payment via phone. Kind regards, Daphne [2/2]
@cbasturea Hi Constantin, please send us your booking code via PM and we take a closer look. Kind regards, Daphne

@VictoriaW_EA Hi Vicki, thank you for reaching out. Our worldwide contact numbers can be found here: https://t.co/ygWKQicOmm. Please mind that due to the considerable amount of calls you may experience longer waiting times at the moment. Kind regards, Derya

data.text: @sashvegas23 Hi Alexander, please contact the Lost property office at LHR or the Lost & Found. All forgotten and lost items at the aircraft will be collected by the cleaning staff and handed over to the local airport. Kind regards, Sarah

@rebecca88965466 @berlinairport @viennaairport Hi Rebecca, I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you. Please refer to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity [1/2]
@itoomeleng__ Hi Tumi, I'm sorry that you still have no answer yet. Please send us via PM your Case nr. and we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Daphne

@luciorum Hi Lukas, I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you. Please refer to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report or PIR which you[1/2]

(2/2) the general regulations, stating that for temporary loss of baggage, 100% for hygienic articles and 50% for clothes that were bought in the meantime, will be indemnified. Please keep all receipts.
Best regards, Alessandra

data.text:
@coriscow Hello,
please send us your booking code so we can have a closer look at your reservation.
Best regards
Alessandra

@HadfieldKerrie Hi Kerrie, we are sorry to hear you were facing difficulties trying to contact us. Due to the current situation, all our lines are unfortunately very busy. Is there anything we can still assist you with? Kind regards, Chris
@hagigat1 Hi there, please send us your booking code in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris

@nikolausf Hallo Nikolaus,
an Bord von Austrian Airlines Flügen ist die Maskenpflicht offiziell aufgehoben.
Bitte beachte dennoch, dass je nach Ausgangs- und Zielland das Tragen einer Maske an Bord vorgeschrieben sein kann. 
Liebe Grüße
Alessandra

data.text: @tarekshaarawy Hi Tarek, thank you so much for your kind feedback which we will gladly forward to our colleagues. We look forward to welcoming you on board again soon. Kind regards, Chris
@EachDayLoving Hi there, we regret reading about this unfortunate situation. Please feel free to seek reimbursement by submitting a claim here: https://t.co/DlPk2wk146 Kind regards, Chris

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @vladdi [2/2] I can assure you that we are in full commitment to you and we are doing everything so that we can quickly offer you our usual service again. If there is still something we can help you with, please contact us via DM and send us your booking code. Kind regards, Derya

@vladdi [1/2] Hi Vladdi, I am sorry that you had to wait so long. We currently have a lot of calls again. At the moment, our passengers also need more time for their concerns. Of course, we also want to take the time that each passenger needs.
@paulustwit Hi there, we just answered on your private message 😉 Kind regards, Daphne
@ourguyingeneva Hi there, I'm sorry that you're still waiting for a reply. Here you can find our world wide telephone numbers: https://t.co/FFefe6Jqyt  Kind regards, Daphne

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @alhamdvlillah Hi Lelo, if you can't purchase your first bag under "My bookings" you still can do it via phone or through the Web Check-in process. Kind regards, Sarah

@ourguyingeneva [2/2] However, we can only ask you to send an email to viellos@austrian.com. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Derya

@ourguyingeneva [1/2] I´m sorry for any frustration caused by the length of time taken to solve your issue. Due to the enormous amount of requests and the current short-time work, there can, unfortunately, be longer waiting times.
@dannews Dear Dan News, this is a false report. There was NO emergency on OS684 ZAG-VIE. Kind regards, Austrian Airlines Communications
@SquawkTracker @SquawkAlert @SquawkTracker, this is a false report. There was NO emergency on OS684. Kind regards, Austrian Airlines Communications
@SquawkAlert @SquawkAlert, this is a false report. There was NO emergency on OS684 ZAG-VIE. Kind regards, Austrian Airlines Communications
@alhamdvlillah Hi Lelo, please access your booking online on https://t.co/D0B55USJbx - ' My bookings'. There you can find all options to amend your reservation. Best regards, Christiane
@karmanomad Hi Nirmal, thank you for taking the time to praise our colleagues😍. I have gladly forwarded your nice words to the respective colleagues. Have a great day. Kind regards, Derya

@nirosham Hi, we’re sincerely sorry to hear that the luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social Media Team has no access to any correspondence or claims. Please refer to the responsible colleagues from the Passenger Irregularity Report Report. Best regards, Christiane

@alexkalyvitis Hi Alex, we’re sorry to hear that your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social Media Team has no access to any correspondence or claims submitted by you. Please refer to the responsible colleagues from the Passenger Irregularity Report. Best regards, Christiane

data.text:
@getbfly [2/2] Unfortunately the Social Media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you. Please continue to refer to the responsible colleagues from the PIR Report for any potential queries.
Best regards, Shawn

@getbfly [1/2]Hi there, 
We’re sorry to hear that your luggage wasn't duly delivered. We want you to know that we can completely understand your anger but we can’t offer an immediate solution in this case.

@zayapono (1/2) Hello Zaya,
as this is the specialized field of our colleagues in the feedback department we kindly ask to you stay in contact with them regarding this matter. We understand that the waiting time can be longer as usual but our colleagues

@zayapono (2/2) will reply as soon as possible to your e-mail, until then we have to kindly ask you for your continued patience. Thank you.
Kind regards, Alessandra

@iamachristina Hello Christina,
you can contact us under this number:
+1 516296 9650
Best regards
Alessandra
@sarahlustberg @toscanaeroporti Hi Sarah, unfortunately, we are unable to track your luggage as the Social Media Team. Best regards, Sarah

@albarrett09 @HeathrowAirport Hi Alison, I am sorry to hear. The Social Media Team does not have access to the baggage system. Please get in touch with the phone number on your lost baggage report or you can check the status about your baggage online via this link https://t.co/hrzpeJ2rHC Best regards, Alessa

data.text:
@jessemorgan [1/2] Hi Jesse, 
We are very pleased to receive your praise for our crew and hear that you felt so at ease on board. Not many passengers take the time to also share their positive experiences with us, so we appreciate your e-mail all the more.

@sarahlustberg Hi there,
Hi, I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Please use the following link
https://t.co/1DV32ZfScp - in order to file an online claim. 
Best regards, Shawn

urls.title: Delayed or damaged baggage
urls.description: Did your case not arrive or did it arrive damaged? No worries, we will take care of this. Read important information about this eventuality.

data.text: @revdavidpenny Hi, please send us a PM with your booking code and how we can assist you. Kind regards, Lyndsay https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
@MtrNoFireworks Hi, did you file a lost report in Heathrow? If not please do so here: https://t.co/DlPk2wk146 Kind regards, Lyndsay

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @ThomasVochten Hi Thomas, we're sorry you're having difficulties. Please send us a PM with your booking code and we'll take a look for you. Kind regards, Lyndsay https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

@Irisoflilies Hi Iris, we are sorry to hear that you have been affected by a cancellation and we apologize for any inconvenience caused. Please send us your booking code in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris
@Samuel_Helbling Hi Samuel, wir haben bereits auf deine DM geantwortet. Freundliche Grüße, Chris
@cwales95 Hi Cameron, please send us the reference number of your claim (XXXX-OS-XXXXX) in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris
@AHeathrow Hi there, we regret reading about this unfortunate situation. Please feel free to seek reimbursement by submitting a claim here: https://t.co/CYbLamOUFH Kind regards, Chris

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @Laurr97 Hi Lauren, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Chris

@shuggiemac1 Hi there, Please contact our colleagues via the following form regarding a possible refund: https://t.co/QI0fSSoknS Due to the high amount of requests we receive at the moment we ask for your understanding that the response can take longer than usual. Kind regards, Chris

urls.title: Enquiry about ticket refunds at customer request
urls.description: You can request refunds for a flight booked on the Austrian Airlines website via our contact form. We’re here to help.

data.text: @shuggiemac1 @Flight_Refunds Hi, please don't share your booking code or ticket number publicly due to privacy reasons. Kind regards, Lyndsay

@misschris712 Hi there, I'm sorry to hear that your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social Media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you. We hope though, that you will be soon reunited with your luggage! 😊 Kind regards, Daphne

@shuggiemac1 Hi there, unfortunately, you will have received the terms and conditions with the voucher. As previously mentioned, these vouchers are no longer valid. A usage of your ticket is not possible anymore. Kind regards, Daphne

@christoph191019 [1/1] Hi Christoph,
We are sorry for all the trouble caused due to the cancelation. Unfortunately, we are currently affected by multiple cancelations, due to  ATC issues in Europe.

@christoph191019 [2/2] We're also sorry that you had difficulty contacting us by phone. Due to the current situation, all our channels are overloaded and there may be longer waiting times. If there is anything else we can assist you with, let us know.
Best regards, Shawn

@brothym94 [1/2] Hi Matej,
Thank you for getting in touch. The mask requirement has officially been lifted on an Austrian Airlines flight. If you feel more comfortable "with", you may of course continue to use your mask.
